accountId.title: Account Id
accountId.description: The Account Id that owns the storefront. Required for security validation.

menuItemId.title: Menu Item Id
menuItemId.description: The Menu_Item__c record Id to update.

description.title: Description
description.description: New description for the menu item. Leave blank to skip.

available.title: Available
available.description: Set availability status. Leave null to skip.

calories.title: Calories
calories.description: New calorie count. Leave null to skip.

imageUrl.title: Image URL
imageUrl.description: New image URL for the menu item. Leave blank to skip.
